Description.Name: Zhukov MKII Heavy Tank
Description.Details: Debuting in 3061, the Zhukov MK II is Kali Yama’s take on the classic Zhukov. Designed in the aftermath of Operation Guerrero, Kali Yama sought to take advantage of the Leagues need for an updated Heavy MBT. With aid from the Word of Blake, Kali Yama acquired a production licence and a raft of half finished designs the engineers at Aldis had considered and discarded over the years. Sifting through the goldmine of technical data, Kali Yama engineers settled on a simple tank destroyer concept. Armed with a pair of UAC/10’s and protected by a pair of AMS’s in conjunction with a Guardian ECM suite, the Zhukov MK II is designed to close and hammer enemies, with the onboard ECM scrambling hostile sensors and targeting systems. Sales have been so far limited to the Free Worlds League, with a limited production run gifted to the Word of Blake as payment for the original technical data. Tracked: High traction, agile turning. Fusion: Expensive engine that works in a Vacuum. Movement: 3/5 Hex: 90/120 Meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 220 40 Left 190 40 Right 190 40 Rear 120 40 Turret 220 40 Total 940 200

YangsThoughts: It's a tank, Boss, they all look the same to me.
